title: Privacy Policy
description: Gold Mustache Barbershop Privacy Policy - How we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Gold Mustache Barbershop is committed to protecting your privacy and properly handling your personal data, in compliance with Brazilian General Data Protection Law (LGPD - Law No. 13.709/2018). This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your information.

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.content: The controller responsible for processing your personal data is:

dataCollected.title: Data Collected
dataCollected.intro: We collect the following types of personal data:

analytics.title: Browsing Data (with consent)
analytics.content: When you consent to analytics cookies, we collect:

purposes.title: Processing Purposes
purposes.booking: Manage appointments and provide our barbershop services
purposes.communication: Send confirmations, reminders, and communications about your appointments
purposes.improvement: Improve our services and user experience on the website
purposes.legal: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis
legalBasis.intro: Your data processing is based on the following LGPD legal grounds:

consent.title: Consent (Art. 7, I)
consent.content: For analytics cookies and marketing communications.

contract.title: Contract Performance (Art. 7, V)
contract.content: For providing booking and service delivery.

legitimate.title: Legitimate Interest (Art. 7, IX)
legitimate.content: For operational improvements and fraud prevention.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.intro: Your data may be shared with the following service providers:
sharing.supabase: Authentication and database platform (US servers, with standard contractual clauses).
sharing.vercel: Website hosting (global servers with appropriate protections).

retention.title: Retention Period
retention.content: We retain your data for as long as necessary to fulfill the described purposes:
retention.account: Account data: as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services.
retention.appointments: Appointment history: 5 years after the last service, for tax and legal purposes.
retention.analytics: Analytics data: 26 months, per Google Analytics default settings.

rights.title: Your Rights (LGPD Art. 18)
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: Access
access.content: Request a copy of the data we have about you.

correction.title: Correction
correction.content: Correct incomplete, inaccurate, or outdated data.

deletion.title: Deletion
deletion.content: Request the deletion of your personal data.

portability.title: Portability
portability.content: Receive your data in a structured format for transfer.

revocation.title: Consent Revocation
revocation.content: Withdraw your consent at any time.

rights.howTo: To exercise your rights, access your account and go to Profile > Your Data, or contact us through the channels listed below.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.intro: We use cookies to improve your experience on the site. You can manage your preferences at any time.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: Necessary for the website to function, including authentication and language preferences. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors use our website. These cookies are only activated with your explicit consent.

cookies.management: You can change your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the cookie settings button in the footer.

security.title: Security
security.content: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encryption in transit (HTTPS), access controls, and security monitoring.

changes.title: Changes to this Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. When we make significant changes, we will notify you through the website or by email. We recommend reviewing this page regularly.

contact.title: Contact and Data Protection Officer (DPO)
contact.content: For questions about this policy or to exercise your rights, contact us:
